verses.name: Luke 18:11
verses.text: The Pharisee stood and prayed thus with himself, God, I thank thee, that I am not as other men are, extortioners, unjust, adulterers, or even as this publican.

verses.name: Luke 18:12
verses.text: I fast twice in the week, I give tithes of all that I possess.

verses.name: Luke 18:13
verses.text: And the publican, standing afar off, would not lift up so much as his eyes unto heaven, but smote upon his breast, saying, God be merciful to me a sinner.
